storyInfo:
The fall-out turns out to be Gnosis's act, at which Monch despairs.
Meanwhile, the Doctor decides to act, yet Ratatos chooses to go it alone.

attributes.content: He's not sending any men after the other clans. He's just guarding the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Right, he's guarding the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Now he's truly seized the Court.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: On the surface, he's won.;History is written by the victor.

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You're right about that.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Even I understand the way Enciodes does things now.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Him handing back power is all a feint. He wanted to flip the whole table over all along.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: The people of Kjerag still can't imagine life without their God.;Enciodes knows what life is like without God.;This isn't Kjeragandr's problem.

attributes.content: Right. Most of us thought he had no way to overcome the Kjerag people's faith for Kjeragandr. They thought he didn't have what it takes.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The Great Elder, Ratatos, Arctosz... even I thought so.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: And he knew that.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That said, I've been wondering about one thing.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: A life without God. Does that necessarily mean there should be no gods?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh, I'm just musing. I'm not depressed at all.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Faith is gradually becoming an obstacle... At the very least, that's how the Kjerag people's faith in Kjeragandr is. I've known that for a long time now.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Thank you, though.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Not that this has anything to do with me, a lowly maid who serves the Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I thought you'd ask me why I'm here with you.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: There are many reasons to choose to be an observer.

attributes.content: Just like you have many reasons to choose to interfere, right?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I will stand firm with my choice, and I hope you will too.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Doctor, the work is done.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I couldn't keep the clan leaders. Ratatos asked me to give you her thanks, but it looks like she's got her own plans. She went back to her territory.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Arctosz's heading back to his place, too. Looks like he's gathering his forces to fight it out with Enciodes.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Doctor, if we let them go back to their lands, won't that lead inevitably to death?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.options: Only they can control their people.;With the way things are, this is how we can keep casualties to a minimum.

attributes.content: What the Doctor's saying is that, with how furious the crowd was, they would most likely have gotten a death sentence right there and then if the two of them were caught.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: And even if that wasn't the case, they would still no doubt stand trial.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The two of them may be labeled traitors, but the two families' subordinates, especially the Paleroches, won't buy that so easily.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: And regardless of whether they take up arms or start infighting, Kjerag will fall into chaos.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But whichever it is, Enciodes will be the righteous one.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: To him, even if things start out chaotic and there are considerable casualties during the process, the whole mess can be still be cleaned up in the end.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: He's not the kind of man who'll just sit it out.

attributes.content: Right, Enciodes went through all that trouble to shape this situation. That means he cares about the masses.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: When I bummed around Karlan Trade, I heard a thing or two about his methods. Most of the staff there thinks he's got foresight.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: And now that he chose to stir the pot out in the open like that? You can tell it's his best option despite all the risks it comes with.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I... I sure hope so.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Silverashes and the Browntails were on better terms in the past. Naturally, he's planted more than a few of his pawns who can help control the chaos.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The problem is still the Paleroches. Their equipment and combat prowess may be behind the times, but their numbers are no joke.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Right, and the Silverashes have always been on pretty bad terms with them.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Besides, the Paleroches' men are all very loyal. It's hard to say they'll betray the Paleroche clan even with everything that has transpired.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That's why I can understand why the Doctor decided to help the two of them.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: A family can only come together if the family head's still alive, and as long as we can influence the leaders in some way, the Doctor can still pull off some rough plan.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Still though, Doctor, I guess I don't have to say it—
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Kjerag's got some complex terrain. It's not easy to get around here. We don't have much time.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Sorry for the wait, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Sorry that you have to help me now, of all times.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Don't mention it. I am a Browntail. This is exactly the time I should stand with my Matriarch.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Do you believe anything Enciodes said?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Of course not. He has to be framing you.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: How go the preparations?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It'll take some time to get back to the Browntail territory from Silverash lands, though I have a car ready, and I pulled a few strings.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Once you and Madame Sciurus are ready, I will make sure you two are taken back to the our land.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Any news from back home?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: After word about the ceremony got out, a few towns near our territory's border started flying the Silverashes' flag.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: There's nothing like that toward the center, but...
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Enough. I have a decent idea of how many men he planted inside our family. With how many of them there are, I'm afraid I won't be able to count all of them when they're all gathered in one spot.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Has Enciodes been up to anything?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The Silverashes have set up camp at the foot of Mount Karlan and on the mountainside.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Hmph, at least he's a man of his word.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The populace there has been very receptive to him too. Absolutely shameless.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: They saw Arctosz's betrayal at the ceremony with their own eyes, after all.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Hmph, out of everyone who doesn't trust Arctosz, it's gotta be those who saw his 'crimes' with their own eyes that don't trust him the most.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Let's not talk about him. What about you? What are you getting from Enciodes?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I... I don't follow...?
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Drop it already. Your acting's terrible.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Come on out and... Arrest Ratatos.
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: Gah...
attributes.name: Browntail Family Noble

attributes.content: If I couldn't see through that trap of yours, then I had no business leading our clan.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Ratatos, I heard the car's...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What's going on here?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Take a guess?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He was going to sell us out?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Looks like you're not as stupid as I made you out to be, dear sister.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Do you have to mock me, even at a time like this?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: How many are still on our side?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: How many? Right, how many...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Sciurus, do you understand what a big mess you've caused?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I never thought...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *Sigh*... That's exactly the problem. You never thought. You never think.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What was I supposed to do?! I... I just wanted to show everyone that I can do something for the Browntails too!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I just...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I just wanted to help you...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You... You look tired, Ratatos. Are you okay?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: And if I say I'm not?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Fine, I get it! This whole thing needs to end somehow, right?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I was the one who started all this. So I'll be the one to end it! And I still don't know how Yucatan and... and my subordinate are doing. I can't just sit here and wait any longer!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Wait! Where are you going?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'll find that prick Enciodes! I'll tell everyone that it was all a personal grudge between me and him, and none of this has anything to do with the Browntails!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: He can take my life if he wants, but he has to hand my people back!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sis, Sis! Why did Grandpa yell at you again? You've done so well!
Is it because you're going to lead the family? Is that why he keeps yelling at you?
I-In that case, I'll be the clan leader! I'll go to Grandpa and ask him to stop yelling at you all the time. I'll lead the family, so he can yell at me all he wants!
Hehe, it's okay. You don't need to worry about me, Sis. I've got Yucatan there for me. We promised each other we'll always play with each other! He'll help me. He's really good at studying too!
Also...
You never cry when you get yelled at, Sis.
Even though you never cry, I don't know why, it really makes my heart ache...
Ha, haha...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What's with you?! You stinking bitch! You can laugh at me, even at a time like this?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Hahaha... *Sigh*... Haha...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: (Rus... my silly sister...)
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You're probably cursing at me in your head again, aren't you?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Something like that.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Grrr!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *Sigh*, come back. Don't go looking for Enciodes. You should stay out of this... Things aren't as simple as you think.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Sciurus, do you remember we last had a nice chat together?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I don't remember the two of us having a nice chat ever.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I guess not...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Alright, I need to think about what to do from here on out. You should go back to whatever it is you do.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Oh, and be careful on your way home. Don't get caught.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What do you mean? You aren't heading back to our land?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Arctosz most likely hasn't gotten back to his estate yet.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Once he's settled down some, he'll probably go out and pick a fight with Enciodes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I've got to do something before that happens.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Don't you do anything stupid. Don't forget. Enciodes got Yucatan and Monch!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: And you... If anything happens to you, I'm gonna be running the show back home! D-Don't you forget that!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus could end up running the show back home, huh...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: That might not be so bad...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Look, it's Sir Arctosz's team...
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner A

attributes.content: I heard he poisoned the Great Elder during the ceremony...
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner B

attributes.content: Shut up, all of you! Think about it. Would he possibly do anything as underhanded as poisoning someone?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Well... no... but...
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner A

attributes.content: You're a Paleroche, and you don't trust him?!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Eeeek!!
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner A

attributes.content: Enough, Gulo.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Taking it out on the common folk. Have you no shame?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But, Sir...!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: It doesn't matter if we were framed by Enciodes. What's done is done. Saying anything isn't going to help our case.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But do we really have to swallow our pride and take it?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Swallow our pride? Of course not!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'll hand it to him. He's good, but do you know what's the biggest mistake he made?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: He didn't kill me at the ceremony.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: As soon as we get back to the estate and have our forces gathered, we'll head back to finish the fight with him.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: We'll show Enciodes just what a big mistake he made.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Very well! I should've expected no less from you, sir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I won't give you this chance.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Valais?!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Those men behind you... Are you betraying the Paleroches?!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Valais... The house of Paleroche has treated you well. Why are you doing this?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You've treated me well...?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: You still don't remember even now, do you?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Remember what? I, Arctosz, am an honorable man. When have I ever—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This is, um?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Don't be afraid, Valais.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Your father will get much better once he takes the Great Elder's elixir and has the evil in him expelled.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: He was injured during the Holy Hunt to protect us.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Great Elder figured he was probably attacked by the Tschäggättä when he was all alone...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: He's too weak now... Come, I'll give him the medicine.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Why isn't my father awake yet? And what is this green stuff on his lips...?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: The evil has spread too deep. Kjeragandr no longer allows his presence here.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: He argued with the Vine-Bear Court several times before. He must have been under the Tschäggättä's influence, and it culminated in the Tschäggättä coming to take him back today.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: If the elixir couldn't regain his strength and faith, then this must be Her will.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The wine the Great Elder drank. It can't be!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Do you remember the bottle of elixir that the Great Elder brought with him when he visited my father? How it was nowhere to be found?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I'm sorry, my master. I had my doubts, and I didn't fully believe it either... until the moment the Great Elder collapsed during the ceremony.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I... I sent my own officer to... with my own hands...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't blame you. It wasn't your fault.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: But perhaps it's high time that Kjerag saw change for the better. I hope you won't stand in my way.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Please think of it as a way to avoid having even more loyal Kjerag warriors end the way he did...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Keep Arctosz from running into any trouble on his way, huh...? Looks like the Doctor got it right again.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I really should've brought Blaze with me. Out of all the elite operators who take the enemy head on, she's the only one who's got the mobility to traverse the mountainous terrain here.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: With the trains stopped, Kjerag's transportation network might as well be nonexistent...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Oh, whatever. Let's get going.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Do you have to go?
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: Yeah, my parents have already decided. There's no room for us in Kjerag anymore.
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: I still don't believe it was your parents who did it, and it's definitely got nothing to do with you.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: I believe it, though.
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: I don't know if my parents really did it, and I also don't know... if I was an accomplice somehow.
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: Even if you were, I'd forgive you.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: No one looks up to my father more than you. I know that.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes, remember our dream?
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: Of course I remember.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: The two of us will turn Kjerag into the most powerful country in the world.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: But you're leaving...
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: I'll be back.
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: Yeah. My parents are thinking of moving to Victoria, and I'll go to school there.
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: This is a good opportunity. I'll study all the advanced stuff there, and once I am done, I'll come back and help you.
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: Heh... You jerk.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: In that case, I'll let you in on this idea that I have. I haven't told anyone about this yet.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm going to leave Kjerag once both Enya and Ensia have grown up.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: Like you, I'll study lots of things and come back.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: You're the future clan leader... Can you really leave Kjerag that long?
attributes.name: Boy Gnosis

attributes.content: I'll come find you when that happens.
attributes.name: Boy Enciodes

attributes.content: Hey, Gnosis. Here's your food.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Tsk, don't think you're getting out of this mess just because you're keeping quiet.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Let me tell you. Every last person in the Silverash clan wants to skin you alive right now.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: How dare you do what you did to Sir Enciodes and the Saintess? If it wasn't for his orders to keep you locked up here, I wouldn't give you even a sip of water, let alone food.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Not going to eat, drink, or even make a peep, huh?
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Alright, then. You can rot here and die for all I care!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Gnosis, you've changed quite a lot.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: You never used to sneer at people, much less belittle them as worthless.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: I could tell you the same.
attributes.name: Young Gnosis

attributes.content: You would never use your status as a weapon, and you never thought much of social pleasantries.
attributes.name: Young Gnosis

attributes.content: It was something I had to learn to deal with the nobles.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: And I couldn't care less how others see me if it means I can better focus on my research.
attributes.name: Young Gnosis

attributes.content: What kind of research are you working on?
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: Life science as well as Originium analysis.
attributes.name: Young Gnosis

attributes.content: Sounds complicated.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: What about you? Surely you must already have a certain standing among the nobles here.
attributes.name: Young Gnosis

attributes.content: Do you remember what we said to each other when you left Kjerag?
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm very glad that I left Kjerag, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: It wasn't until I came to the outside world that I realized we no longer live in times where isolation is enough to keep ourselves out of the affairs around us.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: In the past hundred years, there have been countless exchanges and conflicts between nations. Columbia rose quickly in a conflict, while Gaul, a powerful country, was also wiped out in a conflict.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: All the world's nations are slowly changing in these times separated by Catastrophes. Refusing relations with others is no longer an option.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: If Kjerag remains as it is, keeping its borders closed under the assumption that will earn us a life of peace and tranquility.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: Then only destruction awaits us.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: We've reached the end of this peace and tranquility. We can't wait for anyone to throw open these gates for us. Kjerag must make contact with the outside world. We must take that step forward while we still have control.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: Come help me, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Young Enciodes

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Young Gnosis

attributes.content: *Sigh*, this sucks balls.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Stop complaining. You're starting to make me feel that way too.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: I really don't get it. Why is Sir Enciodes only locking up Gnosis?
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: If I were him, I'd separate the traitor's head from his neck straight away.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: What do you know? How is beheading him going to calm Sir Enciodes's anger?
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: He treated Gnosis so well, only to be betrayed.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: If I were him, I'd torture this guy some.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: You have a point, but aren't we about to go to war with the other two clans? I want to be on the front lines.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Look at you, all bloodthirsty.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: Master.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors A & B

attributes.content: How is Gnosis doing?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He's fasted for a full day, sir.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: He hasn't said a word since we put him in there. Didn't even respond when we shouted at him.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: Let me talk to him.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Hey, what do you think Sir Enciodes is going to talk about?
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: How would I know?
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: Didn't Gnosis used to be a trusted confidant? I'm betting Sir Enciodes is going to poison him. Give him a honorable death.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: You've been reading too many novels.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: That said...
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: It seems Ratatos is seeking the Great Elder's help.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Both you and I knew this would happen sooner or later.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They can't possibly believe everything you have done is in the name of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Most of the company's employees know that it is Karlan Trade they're working for, not Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: A war is not something you start when you have a choice. I hope you can understand my hand was forced.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps you're worrying too much.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Bring down the other two families and rebuild. It's much easier than the 'honorable' solution you're pursuing.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Kjerag would never truly accept me if I seized power by force.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In that case, let me do it.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I have far less worries than you do.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Let you do... what?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can drop the act, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This idea has crossed your mind. We both know that.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Let me, the son of a sinner, the villain of Karlan Trade, be a traitor again. There is no one more suitable for the job.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm not your pawn, Enciodes, and I most definitely am not your underling.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm your partner-in-crime.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Even if you don't agree to it, I'll still do this.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Actually, it'll be for the better if you don't. Our charade will be that much more realistic.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Kjerag has no room for me. Truth be told, I couldn't care less whether it had any room for me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It'll just be another item on my list of charges. I don't care.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm thinking that you actually haven't changed much over the last twenty years.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And why is that?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're a conceited perfectionist.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You always want the perfect result, and you always think that you can get it.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The perfect result would be if Arctosz and Ratatos had not been in our way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Great Elder would also have accepted the change that Kjerag is about to go through, and everything would naturally have unfolded the way we wanted.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That isn't the perfect result. You know that. At most, it's the perfect dream.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They can't see what you and I can see. In that case, you should never have expected them to share the same ideas as us.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But you and I think drastically differently as well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I told you, Enciodes. I'm not your pawn, and I'm not your underling.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I have my own judgment, and our judgments share many overlapping points.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Or would you like to finish me, the traitor, and make this farce real?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Under the dim light, Enciodes reaches his hand out to Gnosis.
I'm just glad that you are my dearest friend.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gnosis keeps silent for a moment. Then, he reaches out to shake Enciodes's hand.
I told you. It'll just be another item on my list of charges. I'm more than used to that.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Nothing has changed from all those years ago.
Arctosz is amassing his forces.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What about Ratatos?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Take a look at this.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.text: Dear Enciodes,\nThe Browntails and Silverashes have long enjoyed an amiable relationship. Although we have had our differences in recent years, they are merely the natural result of our differing views on Kjerag's future.

With Kjerag's future having never looked so bright, it is now clear to me that the Silverashes have come to represent the aspirations of the masses.\nWith the transfer of powers in place, to prevent any unnecessary disputes and to uphold Kjerag's peace—\nI, Ratatos, would like to pledge the Browntails' allegiance to the Silverashes.

I would like to meet with you on this matter, if you would be so kind as to set aside our differences.\nIn addition, I would also like to talk to you about the truth behind your parents' passing.\nYours, Ratatos

attributes.content: An obvious trap...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's worth going, nonetheless.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The situation is not so optimistic that you can take meaningless risks.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We've won, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We've achieved our original goal. Now, the Paleroches and the Browntails are traitors to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: My spies inside the Browntail family will help us with the public opinion. As for the Paleroches, they may be stubborn, but they are all upstanding people.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Once they wrap their minds around the gravity of Arctosz's crime, much of the Paleroches' doors will open to us.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We have ample time to sort out what comes next.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Arctosz and Ratatos will not give up so easily.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That is exactly why I will meet her.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If Ratatos had come with me to Victoria to study all those years ago, she would not be so much weaker than I am.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And now she has put her chips on the table, just like that. It would be untactful of me to not call this bet.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You will one day die of your arrogance, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Then so be it, but that won't happen today or during this outing.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As for Arctosz, he's not entirely without surprises, and that is why I am having you step up now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What can a hot-headed moron like him accomplish?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Arctosz himself can't, though Dr. {@nickname} certainly surprised me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That is the greatest variable in this game of ours, and it's one that I have to watch out for.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I agree that one has done many things beyond my expectation since arriving in Kjerag, but is this Doctor really worthy of your concern?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: One who knows almost nothing about Kjerag has stepped into one of the stage's most vital roles within such a short period of time, greatly disrupting our plans.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I can honestly say that if I were in that position, I would not have been able to do it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And I also cannot begin to imagine what the Doctor is planning to do next. Perhaps the Doctor won't do a thing, or perhaps—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Doctor can do something that I couldn't begin to imagine.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hmph, this isn't my first time telling you this—If you're afraid to lose, you better not act like you're enjoying the challenge.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You've fooled many, but you cannot fool me. You cannot fool the bodyguard you hired from Kazimierz either.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Likewise, this isn't my first time to offer you this rebuttal. Taking delight in a gamble and not wanting to lose are not mutually exclusive.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Much of the joy one derives from a gamble comes not from the result. Rather, it comes from the whole march towards victory.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Fine, say no more. This is always the hardest part for us to reach a consensus. I only wish that I still have a chance to save you before your arrogance ends up killing you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We will have many opportunities to debate this later. In any case, I will leave you in charge while I meet with Ratatos.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Is there anyone left in Karlan Trade who would listen to me?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Weiss, Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The two of them will pass on any of your orders.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gnosis, Sir Enciodes has told us everything. We owe you much.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I never thought it could all be a ruse...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Let's save the pleasantries.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Tsk, and here I thought I could finally get some quiet time.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: My research has been halted for far too long already. At least I could read some books if you'd kept me locked in here.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You're my partner-in-crime, and this undertaking is ours together. You will have more than enough time to do your research in the future.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's only if you make it back here alive...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's time to go, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm leaving everything in your hands, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm curious. Back at the ceremony, were you going at it for real?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What if I was?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Then perhaps you need to spend some time to work on your skills.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You looked worse than before.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I needn't you worry.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: My impression is that you could make half an enemy of mine. I have to worry, lest life get a bit too boring.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Caster is only a side job to me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Your acting could be that much better too, if you were a little stronger.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That said, I've never seen you even a little excited.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Convincing performance.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Not that you're acting.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Gnosis, what should we...?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Where's Monch?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Monch is being held in another room. I can take you there.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Does she know?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes said it'd be best for you to tell her yourself.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Lead the way.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sir Gnosis...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Monch takes out a dagger from her boot. It is her most prized weapon.
It is a gift that Gnosis made for her between his experiments.
She lightly strokes the dagger, her eyes clouded with doubt and uncertainty.
Don't do anything stupid, Monch.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It looks like you're well...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Thank goodness.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You've done a great job.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I... I promised you.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Whatever your orders, your wish is my command...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Judging by your look, I assume you've figured it all out.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Right, Enciodes and I had all of this planned in advance.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I see, so that's really how it is...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: The Silverashes' Weiss was waiting below the cliff to rescue me, and I've been wondering ever since.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: If this was all a charade planned in advance, then what role do I play in it?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: And now that I find you here, I'm finally sure...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: My apologies.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You needn't ever apologize to me...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Monch, you stand firm in your beliefs. I understand, but I will judge for myself what I say.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Enciodes and I had a rift, leading me to leave Karlan Trade and make contact with Ratatos. That was our plan all along.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And the fewer people who knew of this plan, the better. That's why I never told you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Both of us knew the risks.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I had to make sure even the finest details were under our control. Everything had to be absolutely perfect. This isn't one of my usual maneuvers... There is no do-over.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If that displeases you in any way, I must apologize.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No... T-That's not it...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Why...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what it is you want to do or what plans you have. I...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: ...I will always support you.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Why didn't you believe me?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: You could've trusted me.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Monch, I hope you can understand.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's because I fully trust you that I handed you such an important task under those circumstances.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I trust you, my finest subordinate, to perfectly execute my plans.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't overthink it. You've done very well, and everything is over now. Try to relax a little.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You should take the time to rest.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Looks like you're not in the mood to talk...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'll come see you again.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Trust me...?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Who trusts me? And where are they...?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Sir Gnosis... Can I still trust you?
attributes.name: Monch
